title: SCP-8541 Art _ Maybe You Do Remember
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:space]]

+ **SCP-8541**

[[collapsible show="✦ Touch the sculpture." hide="✦ Good. Now, pick up your phone."]]
[[include component:image-block
|name=8541.png
|caption=**Maybe You Do Remember**
|width=80%
|align=center]]
[[/collapsible]]
    
[[collapsible show="✦ Look into the telescope?" hide="✦ Someone installed a monitor screen on the Moon. The screen glitched, then words appeared."]]
> Have you seen it? Do you remember it?
>  
> It truly is haunting, you know? The past. The mistakes. The things you longed to bury deep down in the darkest place of your mind.
> 
> But it will find its way to the surface. And then, even if you've forgotten it, maybe it's time to remember.
> 
> Now, pick up the phone, won't you?
[[/collapsible]]
     
[[collapsible show="✦ Find the source of the Astronomy Phenomena?" hide="✦ SCP-8541"]]
[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8541]]]
[[/collapsible]]

-----
> [[size larger]]**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:a-shining-moon-s-observatory Enter the Observatory?]**[[/size]]
